snippet: In this tiny principality, a new museum and a growing number of contemporary art galleries have provided a new draw for tourists.
abstract: Monaco, on the southeastern coast of France, has long been known as a playground for wealthy vacationers, but in recent years has become home to a distinctive and vibrant international contemporary art community.
lead_paragraph: In this tiny principality, a new museum and a growing number of contemporary art galleries have provided a new draw for tourists.

headline.seo: Monaco Adds Art to Its Seaside Allure
headline.main: Monaco Adds Art to Its Seaside Allure
headline.print_headline: Monaco Adds Art to Its Seaside Allure
